name: Suicide Guy Collection
overview: Dreams have never been so intense! Suicide Guy and Suicide Guy: Sleepin' Deeply for the first time together in a mega bundle! Set in the incredible and extraordinary dreams of its protagonist, this time you'll have to save not 1, but 2 beers. Features: • 25 + 7 levels for hours of fun! • Physics based levels • Ultimate moves: be able to pick up items, throw them, activate mechanisms and even burp. • Funny creatures to annoy • Vehicles to drive
